titleStmt.title: Gamēlia on the happy marriage of the most accomplished paire, H.R. Esq. and the vertuous A.B.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Hugh, Esq.
Baynton, Anne.

notesStmt.note: Poems in English and Latin, signed with various initials.
In ms. on t.p.: Hugh Rogers, Anne Baynton.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
